content.label: A tad of a learning curve after playing various "classic" solitaires over the years but quite addicting now that I've got the hang of it.
I’ve clocked countless hours playing this silly game and I love it.
Waste of time
Deleted
I really like the game but would like to be able to reset the game back to 0%. I would like to be able to reset the scoring.

Such a unique and delightful twist on a classic game!  I’ve played hundreds of times and can confidently say I’ve nearly mastered 5-suit, and every step of the way was thoroughly enjoyable. The key is in identifying common patterns and striking a balance between high/low risk strategies.  There’s definitely a learning curve to it, so don’t get discouraged and just enjoy the process!

Great concept, aesthetically pleasing + satisfying execution, neat customizable options, variable gameplay modes, all around A+! I was happy to pay a few bucks because 1) it provided many hours of entertainment, and 2) I enjoy supporting independent content creators wherever I can.  You go, Zach Gage!

Deleted cuz I can’t even play one game after loading app. Ads first, really. NO FUN

Three bucks to disable ads seems high. I will pay one buck to cut out the ads. Yes the ads are more frequent and make replay value lower.

Too many ads. Giving up. 

I love the game but the ads are relentlessly long and can't be dismissed. So I tried one last time tonight since it's been a while since I opened it thinking it may have changed. Nope. Super long as right off the bat. 

I went ahead and clicked on the ad that popped up and I'm going to play that game now. Bye!👋🏼

I want to give this 5 stars, I love this game a lot, but I can’t even play it anymore it’s so frustrating... the game itself is fine, but the ads are insane. I mean, I open it and press play and have to wait through an ad. Without playing at all. And these ads are LONG and unskippable. I can’t even turn off my WiFi to skip them, I have to wait through them every single one minute game. It’s too frustrating, I’m just going to find a new solitaire app.
Thought it would be fun to make the in-app purchase for numbered decks. I always love a puzzle game. But when I selected the very first one, I got an ad! What a rip off.
So many ads and they take SOOOO long to give you an x to close them. Awful!!!!!
Fun game but oppressive ads. I rather watch a junk food or car commercial than watch AI play some dumb app game.
This is a fun solitaire with simple straightforward gameplay. The update is a load of fun

title.label: SO FUN- but ads are painful

content.label:
I love this game until I finish and are forced through an ad EVERY TIME. They pretend like they are doing you a favor by giving you 1 extra play on some hard levels that I've never wanted to play after watching 5 ads.
I understand you need ad revenue, but please make the ads optional for those who do not want the alternate levels.

If you love card games but you’re tired of playing the same ole boring way, give this a try! I really like the way he combined freecell with solitaire and gave it a twist! Interesting, fun, addicting, some what challenging (but I think if I purchase the full version I can play 2-4 suits instead of 1 so it would make it more challenging) still debating on that though. Right now I’m personally challenging myself on “best time, least amount of moves & undo’s” Overall I’d give it 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️! Great game! 🙌
Love the game but the static background noise is super annoying. Ruins every song I listen to and there is no way to turn it off!
I purchased the full game after the last update it went away. When I try to restore my purchase it fails. Otherwise this is my favorite game.
twist on Solitaire!

I've been enjoying this game ever since it came out. It's very easy to play. Simple yet satisfying. Everything that you would like in a Solitaire game... People who are complaining about the ads. Just buy the game! It's very reasonably priced. If you don't buy it who do you think pays the developer. That's right the ads.
It’s a good game. Zach’s a cool dude

I used to play this game for hours. However, I turned off the cellular data on it, and now it won’t let me play because it can’t play an ad for me. It was better before the ads. Sadly I will now be uninstalling.

Somewhere the developer says that almost all of the games are winnable.  I have played this game a TON and found about six that I can’t beat so far, that includes four and five suit. It’s not easy, but that’s why it’s fun. I just start over and try a different route. Levels are tough! They have been thoughtfully created to challenge! Imagine what it takes to create things. If you have created anything to sell or are a small business owner, you would understand 3$ for a great game and ads placed where they are. Creators love to create but we have to eat...creating anything is not charity work. It’s a job.  3$ is a tip for a job well done on something you enjoy while waiting at the DMV or whatever. 
Awesome game! I’d buy it again! ☺️
Too many ads that are too long. Too bad, really ruins it.
Currently my favorite game, by far.
Updated recently and now it’s unplayable because of the ads that pop up before every game. I just deleted it and will find another game to play.
I love this app, I’ve been playing for a really long time but the ads lately are waaay too long. It’s discouraging me from opening the app. I hope this changes 😬 I would hate to not play it.

I used to really love this game. It was a great way to kill a little time. Now I’m not one to leave reviews very often. But I updated the app today, and now it is completely unusable. The update said it was going to provide support for the new iPhones. I have an iPhone 8 Plus. The game completely freezes no matter what. I have tried refreshing the app and restarting my phone. Now I get ads that I can’t close out of. This was a great game. I’m sorry to say I’ll be deleting it.

title.label: This update doesn’t deal out cards

content.label: Correction: it will not the deal out any cards when you have no internet connection.  It still deals out the cards when you are connected to the internet. But I mainly play this on a commute with spotty reception, so it doesn’t work i in that condition. I don’t know why a solitaire game needs to “Phone Home” to work. It’s not like I’m playing against another person 😁
I love this game!

Hey Zack,
Great game, I’m having tons of fun playing it, almost 100% win ratio in 4 suit. Unfortunately recent update have broken the ads - whenever there should be an ad displayed, it displays just an empty board. Solution is to quit and reopen the game. However, when you force quit a game and open it again, the ads are not closable, you have to play a different new game to fix it. iPhone 5s

title.label: Fun game but ads are terrible

content.label:
After a few trial plays, I really enjoy this game. It has good replay value. It’s not very complicated, and I usually play about 20-30 minutes a day. The games little counter says I’ve played about 2,000 times.

But $3 is a little steep with $1 being the norm for these type games. So I’ve just been suffering through the ads...until now. I have my phone silenced 99% of the time. Now if I play in bed even without an audiobook or music going the ads blare sound and (in typical ad fashion) they’re loud and obnoxious. To really twist the knife it used to be an ad after every five consecutive plays. Now that number has gotten shorter to every two or three plays.

I understand the creators wanting to make money, that pays their bills. But I won’t play if the advertising comes after every two minute game session. And I will never pay more than $1 for a card game app. So either lighten up on the ads and make less but still steady amount of ad revenue, or lose it all together.
Fun game when it worked. Too many bugs now.

This is now the easiest solitaire game to win because there is literally nothing to do but look at a blank game board. I guess fixing the game for XR and XS breaks it for iPhone X. Too bad this was a great and addictive game.

I’ve had this game for quite sometime and I always enjoy killing a bit of time playing it. I never had any issues with it until the update for XS Max and XR support. Now it won’t start the game on my XS anymore... 😢
The most recent update caused a bug that makes the cards not appear in any mode; it is not able to be reset by force quitting the app. This makes the app completely UNUSABLE!
Update to support new iPhones seemed to make the game no longer work on my iPhone 6. But it is back to working and I am back to playing solitaire.

I spend way more time playing this game than is likely healthy for me. However, I just got an iPhone XR, and the game clips around the ears next to the notch. I wonder if this is a problem for other iPhone X’s since that design has been out for a year. I hope it’s fixed soon.

Addicted to this game but it keeps shutting off mid game causing me to have to reopen the game.  When I reopen the game it starts me at a whole new hand which skews my stats. I’ve updated, uninstalled and reinstalled (losing my stats in the process🤬). Fix please!!

I am a huge fan of solitaire games, and this is by far one of my favorite ones. It had a very simple and elegant design, but the changes it brings to solitaire are all very enjoyable. This feels much more skill based than the average randomness of most solitaires. Would recommend to anyone looking for a fresh experience on the rather bland genre.

title.label: Good game, but drains the battery

content.label: If you’re standing out in the cold this app is great. Something fun to play for 10 minutes until you’re batteries are dead.
The game keeps crashing whenever i want to open it it wont let me play.
I’ve been planing this game for a long time but ever since the last iOS update it constantly crashes when I try to play.
I love this game but once I got iOS 12 it started crashing whenever I tried to open it. Please fix! I’m sad
Great game, but keeps crashing! Want to play this amazing game.
Love it. Super fun and great design.
The game Is fun, but I can’t play single ex or five mode cause the game crashes every time it tries to show ad and I don’t get points to play. Please fix.

title.label: Great game but lots of bugs

content.label: I love playing this game but it crashes more often than not. I can usually only play one game at a time because once I hit replay it crashes.

I was going to purchase the app because I love the game & I wanted the “warm feeling of supporting an independent artist” but each time I get close to winning a deck the app just closes without warning..which then ruins my playing stats.. :(
I’d prefer to give this more stars, but after a few days of playing the game, it now crashes after almost every hand, and I couldn’t find a way to report the problem in the game.
Addicted to this game! Just as challenging as regular solitaire plus I love that you can stack the cards in ascending and descending orders! Great job Zach Gage!
